```{r library, echo=FALSE,warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(knitr)
```

```{r load data, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE, message = FALSE}
biomarkerFile <- "biomarkers.xlsx"
covariateFile <- "covariates.xlsx"

biomarkerData <- read_xlsx(biomarkerFile)
covariateData <- read_xlsx(covariateFile)
```

#Orignal data summary
```{r original data}
head(biomarkerData)
summary(biomarkerData)
kable(biomarkerData[1:5,])
```
